ComicInfo.Title: A King Comes Riding
ComicInfo.Summary:
In the aftermath to his battle against the Serpent Men, Spider-Man receives help from none other than Doctor Strange!
Continued from the previous issue. After Spider-Man was poisoned by a Serpentine's bite, Doctor Strange sends our web-hero back in time in his astral form - over 20,000 years ago! With the power to possess any human body he wishes, will Spidey be able to find a cure with the aid of the mighty King Kull?
